name: Block Dude X
description:
Block Dude Ⅹ is the 10th-anniversary enhanced remake/tribute of Block Dude, the seminal side-scrolling block-stacking puzzle game, best known for its inclusion on the TI-83+ graphing calculator's "PuzzPack". It features both a faithful recreation of the original game's levels (and optionally, art style), as well as a modern coat of paint in the form of new graphics, music, and additional levels and mechanics.

Please make sure to view the included help file before playing. Thank you!

Credits

  • Hinchy (@ItsHinchy): development, graphics, music, sound, anniversary mode level design
  • Joe Pierce (@LBUncleJoe): anniversary mode level design
  • Brandon Sterner: original creator of Block Dude, classic mode level design ("Block Dude" name and game elements used with permission)
